title: #86 - Hotline Edition: How Do I Meet New People in a Small Town?
description:
You’ve got questions? Maria has the answers!

Every week, we open up the Ask a Matchmaker Hotline where YOU call in with any questions you have for Maria… dating, love, life, style…she’s here to help with it all.

To be on an upcoming episode to ask a question, make sure to follow Maria on insta to know when the hotline will be open next! http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria

This week…

  • I live in a small town and my dating options are limited. How do I meet new people?
  • How do I get early conversations in dating to go from interview-like questions to something fun and flirty?
  • I just had breast reduction surgery. Should I tell potential partners about it?
  • Our first man calls in! (brave soul) He has a rant about dating and Maria gives him some dating profile tips. (You can actually see her review of this guy’s dating profile on TikTok https://www.tiktok.com/@realmatchmakermaria/video/7047348056362339630)

To learn when Maria will open up the next Ask a Matchmaker Hotline, follow her at http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria

Follow Agape Match on Instagram at http://instagram.com/agapematch

Follow the podcast on Instagram at http://instagram.com/askamatchmaker
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
